nodes.bodyText: Would we really define which tests to run on the Azure CI like this? Or would it be some set of tests selected via other tags? Even if it were explicit using a new tag, should we call it CI, rather making it about Azure itself, which is merely the platform which we're using to run the tests.

Create a new tag is a simple thing. We cannot run there whole regression tests, because HW limitations for azure VM will cause several failures. We can maybe use acceptance tag and slightly extend it with some cases which are not currently under azure tag.
